title: Wolfdog Site Manifest

$schema.description: lol if i don't include this, vscode yells at me

version.description: The version of Wolfdog Generator that this manifest is intended for

outputDir.description: Directory to output the resulting baked and ready to go website to (relative to where the manifest is)

staticAssetsInputDir.description: Path to directory of "static assets" (relative to where the manifest is), that will have all of its content copied verbatim into the output directory

partialTemplatesDir.description:
Path to directory of Handlebars Partials (relative to where the manifest is), that will be loaded before any pages are templated.

See: https://handlebarsjs.com/guide/partials.html

additionalPageTemplatesDir.description: Path to directory of "additional pages" (relative to where the manifest is), that will be passed through Handlebars and output to the output directory. Subdirectory structure will be kept.

additionalValuesInTemplateScope.description: Optionally, values to be passed onto every single Handlebars template, in a prop named `additionalValues`

postInputDir.description: Directory to read posts from (relative to where the manifest is)

postOutputFileTemplate.description: Handlebars template that, given the post's template scope, yields the output file path. (relative to the general output directory)

postTemplate.description: Path to the Handlebars template used for rendering posts (relative to where the manifest is)

postPubDate.description: Settings for formatting post publication dates

formatString.description:
Luxon format string to use

See: https://moment.github.io/luxon/#/formatting?id=table-of-tokens
